Posts.Content: My sister has ER,PR 90% grade 3 ductal carcinoma (mbc) from Nov 2015 ,primary breast and extensive bone mets,she was given letrezol for 8 months,then fulvestrant 1.5 month six injections,then xeloda 25 cycles but the cancer progressed to liver doe to which chemotherapy started with 5-flurouracil,cyclophoshphamide and epirubicin (2 chemos 21 days apart)but due to txicity and side effects she was give paclitixel instead of cef she took 7 chemos but noticed two previous nodules growing on her breast; skin .PET has been done and the cancer has reduced from bones but increased in liver now oncologist plans to give her gemcitabine need advice on line of tratment .I am worried for her .I have read survivor stories on net. I need advice in managing her cancer so as to get her disease into remission.
Posts.Title: Recurrence on chemo mbc how to manage stage 4 for maximum survival
